meanings.definition: A unit of electrical potential equal to one million volts.
meanings.sent1: The lightning strike produced several megavolts of electricity.
meanings.sent2: The power plant generates megavolts of electricity to supply the city.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel got a shock from a few megavolts of static electricity.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a burst of megavolts.
meanings.sent5: The sound of thunder was accompanied by a crackling of megavolts in the air.

meanings.definition: A measurement of electrical potential in the millions of volts.
meanings.sent1: The scientist recorded the megavolts of energy released during the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The high-voltage power lines carry megavolts of electricity across long distances.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's arch-nemesis tried to harness megavolts of power for his evil plans.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was palpable, like a surge of megavolts waiting to be released.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds crackled with the promise of megavolts ready to strike.
